roleset_name: take a record of a person's fingerprints (or metaphorical extension)

roles.descr: crime leading to arrest and fingerprinting
roles.descr_trans: 导致逮捕和采集指纹的犯罪行为

roles.descr: domain in which there is a unique signature, akin to fingerprints
roles.descr_trans: 具有唯一签名的域，类似于指纹

roleset_name_trans: 记录一个人的指纹（或隐喻延伸）
